--- Reviewed 3 of 15 files at r1, 1 of 3 files at r2. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved, some commit checks failed. --- _Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/249#-:-KWKN1HJILAEOAvSPhOt:b-jbsf8z)_

The comments, argument names and function names in this header file are maddening. Is changing them in scope of this PR?

---

--- Reviewed 1 of 3 files at r2. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved, some commit checks failed. --- _Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/249#-:-KWMb44xmTlRCRV3SpDA:b-jbsf8z)_

That is out of scope. We will certainly do it in one of the next PRs. I'd also like to put a namespace around all the functions. I'm leaning towards `crypto` even though that's somewhat taken by libsodium. Let me know if you have better/different ideas.

---

commit.message:
Use apidsl for the crypto_core API.

This allows us to use apidsl features like namespaces to enforce a
naming standard.
